Package univers.player

Enum Class Character

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Character>
univers.player.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Character>, Constable
public enum Character extends Enum<Character>
Represents different types of characters in the game like Human, Elf, Orc, etc. They have different abilities and characteristics, like health points, chance of success, etc. They can also have different interactions with the environment. They can be controlled by the player. They have all the same attributes in Attribute.java.
